Text: RE Directors disclosure for Enron International Energy Asia Pte Ltd Cc Jamespst Hi Frank Here is Jims information Stock Options Acquired Disposed Bal If you have any questions be sure to let me know Thanks Elaine Original Message From Lobdell Frank Sent Thursday April PM To Derrick Jr James Cc Overturf Elaine Subject Directors disclosure for Enron International Energy Asia Pte Ltd Mr Derrick Like last year we are preparing the Directors Disclosures in connection with our filing of the audited financial statements of our Singapore office This disclosure requires certain information regarding your holdings of Enron stock and stock options Regarding stock options I have requested the necessary information from Elaine Overturf Corporate Secretarys office however I need the following information regarding your Enron Corp ENE stock holdings Balance at beginning year should be shares the ending balance shown on last years disclosure please confirm this amount Acquired during the year Disposed during the year Balance at end of year Once I have obtain this information I will forward the completed disclosure forms for your signature Thank you Frank Lobdell ext

RE OptionsRod if you are talking about Enron Corp options the procedure for you has not changed You just call Paine Webber at or and let them know what you want to doproviding of course you dont have any material nonpublic information about Enron stock Now if you are going to exercise EOTT options in a cashless exercise and sell the units you would have to get clearance from EOTT legal and then call me so I can prepare the forms which need to be signed and put in the mail on the day you sell the units and then you would need to file Forms reporting the transactions by the th of the following month that I would prepare for your signature Call me at Ext if you have any other questions Thanks Elaine Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday June AM To Overturf Elaine Subject Options What are the procedures now for me if I want to exercise options Rod Hayslett EB

Re Form Reminder for AprilSteve I am not aware of any transactions such as stock option exercises etc which have to be reported by May Thanks for focusing on this matter each month Elaine Steven J ES AM To Elaine OverturfCorpEnron cc Subject Form Reminder for April do I need to do anything I believe the only transaction I had was related to a set of shares which were released to me earlier in the year Some of the shares were sold at that time to pay the income tax on the distribution We discussed this before and my recollection is I did not have to make a filing Could you confirm by email Forwarded by Steven J KeanHOUEES on AM Rebecca NRON AM Sent by Kelly NRON To Kenneth NRON Jeff NRON Joseph W SuttonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT rebecca mark zurix Ken ateway Cliff CT Mark CT Joe HirkoEnron nron Communications Stanley nron Ken RiceEnron nron Communications Lou L ES Rick CT Richard NRON James NRON Andrew S CT Steven J ES Mark NRON Mike CT Jeffrey CT J Mark nron Cindy NRON cc Rosalee NRON Sherri NRON Pam BensonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Marsha ZURIX Dolly ateway Susan CT Nicki CT Nancy YoungEnron nron Communications Cindy NRON Dorothy DaltonEnron nron Communications Karen ES Karen K CT Sharron NRON Stephanie NRON Bridget CT Maureen ES Joannie NRON Cathy CT Sue CT Dolores nron Bobbie NRON Subject Form Reminder for April please open the attached document
